title: HBO Max Schedule November 18-24 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added
description: HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include Watchmen: Chapter I, Night Is Not Eternal, Mysteries of the Abandoned Season 11, and The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3. On November 18, 2024, Watchmen: Chapter I will be made available on HBO Max. Directed by Brandon Vietti, the film is […] The post HBO Max Schedule November 18-24 2024: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Those curious to know HBO Max's weekly schedule for November 18-24 2024, can find all the details and information here.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include Watchmen: Chapter I, Night Is Not Eternal, Mysteries of the Abandoned Season 11, and The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3. On November 18, 2024, Watchmen: Chapter I will be made available on HBO Max. Directed by Brandon Vietti, the film is an animated superhero drama. It is set in an alternate world and revolves around the murder mystery of a famous superhero. The case further leads to many superheroes coming back into action after retirement. However, the murder mystery becomes a threat to numerous lives and the world. Further, Night Is Not Eternal will premiere on the platform during the week. Directed and produced by Nanfu Wang, Night Is Not Eternal is a documentary venture. It chronicles the life of a Cuban activist Rosa Maria Paya, who is also the daughter of Nobel Prize nominee Oswaldo Paya. The young girl has only one goal set in her mind which is to change the political system in Cuba. Also coming out on HBO Max is the eleventh season of Mysteries of the Abandoned. The documentary series explores the marvelous but abandoned architecture in the world. Every place carries a unique but mysterious story behind its creation, leaving viewers thrilled. Additionally, The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3 will be available on the platform. The drama series explores the lives of a group of teenagers at Essex College. These girls try to manage their relationships while facing the struggles of adulthood and careers. New HBO Max releases for November 18-24 2024 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from November 18-24 2024 November 18 Watchmen: Chapter I (2024) November 19 Night Is Not Eternal (HBO Original) November 20 Surveilled (HBO Original) Fareed Zakaria Documentaries, Episode 205 November 21  Mysteries of the Abandoned, Season 11 (Discovery) Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch, Season 4 (Discovery) The Sex Lives of College Girls, Season 3 (Max Original) Human vs. Hamster (Max Original series by Magnolia Network) For more HBO Max Content, find out who died in the last episode of The Penguin. Also, learn if the show has been canceled or renewed for a second installment.
html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie releases for November 18-24 2024 include Watchmen: Chapter I, Night Is Not Eternal, Mysteries of the Abandoned Season 11, and The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3.

On November 18, 2024, Watchmen: Chapter I will be made available on HBO Max. Directed by Brandon Vietti, the film is an animated superhero drama. It is set in an alternate world and revolves around the murder mystery of a famous superhero. The case further leads to many superheroes coming back into action after retirement. However, the murder mystery becomes a threat to numerous lives and the world.

Further, Night Is Not Eternal will premiere on the platform during the week. Directed and produced by Nanfu Wang, Night Is Not Eternal is a documentary venture. It chronicles the life of a Cuban activist Rosa Maria Paya, who is also the daughter of Nobel Prize nominee Oswaldo Paya. The young girl has only one goal set in her mind which is to change the political system in Cuba.

Also coming out on HBO Max is the eleventh season of Mysteries of the Abandoned. The documentary series explores the marvelous but abandoned architecture in the world. Every place carries a unique but mysterious story behind its creation, leaving viewers thrilled.

Additionally, The Sex Lives of College Girls Season 3 will be available on the platform. The drama series explores the lives of a group of teenagers at Essex College. These girls try to manage their relationships while facing the struggles of adulthood and careers.

New HBO Max releases for November 18-24 2024

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from November 18-24 2024

November 18

  • Watchmen: Chapter I (2024)

November 19

  • Night Is Not Eternal (HBO Original)

November 20

  • Surveilled (HBO Original)
  • Fareed Zakaria Documentaries, Episode 205

November 21 

  • Mysteries of the Abandoned, Season 11 (Discovery)
  • Mystery At Blind Frog Ranch, Season 4 (Discovery)
  • The Sex Lives of College Girls, Season 3 (Max Original)
  • Human vs. Hamster (Max Original series by Magnolia Network)

For more HBO Max Content, find out who died in the last episode of The Penguin. Also, learn if the show has been canceled or renewed for a second installment.
